subject: feat: implement PWA with offline support and install prompts
body:
- Add versioned caching to service worker with multiple strategies:
  - Cache First for fonts/images
  - Network First for API calls with offline fallback
  - Stale While Revalidate for JS/CSS
- Create usePWAInstall hook for install prompt handling
- Create usePWAUpdate hook for service worker updates
- Add PWABanner component with install/update UI
- Update manifest.json with correct dark theme colors
- Update index.html theme-color and status bar style
- Add PWABanner to home screen
